title: BBT wins journalism awards
text:
0 comments BBT Mon, 12 Oct 2015 09:41 Follow @BBT_online Buying Business Travel was delighted to win three trophies at the Business Travel Journalism Awards. The annual gala event was held last week (October 8) at the Magazine Restaurant in London’s Hyde Park.
BBT won Supplement of the Year for its Leading 50 TMCs, while Rob Gill won Responsible Journalist of the Year and David Churchill won Features Journalist of the Year in the accommodation category.
BBT’s sister publication Business Traveller also enjoyed a winning evening with Graham Smith winning Best Use of Digital and Social Media in Journalism and Jenny Southan picking up two awards in the Features Journalist for Industry Trends and Air.
The Business Travel Journalism Awards is organised by Carlson Wagonlit Travel, and judged by an independent panel of industry experts. Chairing this year’s judging panel was BBC business journalist Steph McGovern, who hosted the evening and presented the awards.
